#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	long long int x1,x2,y1,y2,m,disx,disy;
	int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%lld %lld %lld %lld",&x1,&y1,&x2,&y2);
		disx=abs(x1-x2);
		disy=abs(y1-y2);
		m=__gcd(disx,disy);
		disx=disx/m;
		disy=disy/m;
		printf("%lld\n",((disx - 1) + (disy - 1) + 1) * m);
	}
		
	
	// your code goes here
	return 0;
}
